pages.text: $(l)Perfect Asgardian Steel$(), a mythical resource of unparalleled legend, remains the exclusive treasure of the mighty Aesir gods. $(br2)Known to exist only in the form of ingots, this extraordinary material is imbued with the primordial magic of all elements and realms, rendering it a singular resource for the creation of divine weaponry. $(br2)Though it yields easily to deformation, only the most exalted blacksmiths, chosen by fate and skill, possess the prowess to forge truly divine relics from this celestial metal.
